Q_DESC:
Alice is given an assignment by her programming teacher. The assignment is to write a program for string matching. 

She was asked to write a function match(char[],char[]) which return an integer. This integer has to be -1 if the match doesn't occur and the location if the string is present.                                           

For example the string Paris is present in Welcome to Paris. If the string is present then it's location (i.e. at which position it is present) is printed. We are implementing naive string search algorithm in our program.
